description.message: This extension can set up proxy for each host you have visited.

proxy_server_desc.message: Configure your proxy server. One proxy server a line. Will auto try next server if the previous one fails.

white_list_desc.message: When the whitelist mode is turned on, all the domain names outside the whitelist will use proxy.

black_list_desc.message: When the blacklist mode is turned on, only the domain name in the blacklist will use proxy.

mode_system_desc.message: Use the proxy settings of system

mode_white_list_desc.message: All domains outside white list will use proxy

mode_black_list_desc.message: Only domain inside black list will use proxy

domain_list.message: The domain name requested by the current page:

migration_explain.message: Since the rule format of black(white) list has been changed in new version, click this button will change the format of rules in black(white) list
